description.value:
You have become well-versed in the mantras and ways of your beliefs. Seldom are the moments when you are found at a loss for inspiration with your faith to guide you.

 When you roll any of your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.CTOHXD4403501WIK]{Eikonic Numbers}, you can immediately activate one of the following Mantras.

  • Your Awareness and Wisdom (Perception) checks are increased by +5 until the end of your next turn.
  • Your AC increases by +1 until the end of your next turn.
  • You gain +1 on all save checks until the end of your next turn.
  • You can restore up to your Wisdom Modifier worth of temporary hit points distributed amongst creatures within 15 feet of you.
  • You have +1 on skill checks until the end of your next turn.
  • Any unassigned Mantra from the same Divine Dominion as the rolled Eikonic Number.


 Upon reaching the Growth Level at 11th overall level, you can activate this ability twice when you roll an Eikonic Number.

system.requirements: Must have the Cleric Starter Abilities
